name: QuoteMaker
0:
”Alexa, open Quote Maker.”
”Alexa, ask Quote Maker to create a notification.”
”Alexa, what are my notifications?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quote maker
des:
Quote Maker is a development tool that allows developers to create notifications in real-time, and trigger the sending of SetIndicator directives to all Alexa-enabled devices connected to the associated Amazon account. When you ask Quote Maker to create a notification, a randomly selected quote is added to your notifications queue, and results in your device receiving a directive with instructions to persistently inform the user that a notification is available to be retrieved. 

To get started, simply say: 
"Alexa, open Quote Maker." 
"Alexa, ask Quote Maker to create a notification." 

To retrieve your notifications, say: 

"Alexa, what are my notifications?" 

Test notifications with the AVS device SDK: https://github.com/alexa/avs-device-sdk/wiki
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
